description:
This spec piece highlights the feeling of freedom and escape that comes with booking a stay with Airbnb. In a dimly lit office  a weary-looking robot, toils away at their desk. 

After booking a lakeside stay and arriving at the idyllic destination, we see that the robot was a human all along, the serene environment allowing them to relax.

With this captivating 40-second video ad, we hope to evoke a sense of longing and escape in a young professional audience, inspiring them to break free from the mundane and embrace the idea of escaping to a serene and rejuvenating lakeside retreat through Airbnb.
When you belong anywhere, you can be anything and there’s no door you can’t open. You’re invited to stay at The Barbie Malibu Dreamhouse. A one time, two night stay–Only on Airbnb.
Not everyone needs keys to access happiness. This Spec ad was created for Airbnb's wi-fi-enabled smart locks that need no keys.
Airbnb properties being a pitstop for Santa, and turning into a long vacation is what this ad is all about.
A spec ad for AirBnB highlighting the pros of long term stays
Wherever you travel you will find a place that you will love to live.
We see an elephant swimming with dolphins.
